title: Foolish Jest
effect1: If you deal this card during setup, return it to the box and do not replace it
effect2: Start the game with 1 less plot in the timeline

title: Red herring
effect1: Look at the top plot in your deck, then put it back

title: Found a charity
effect1: Pay 1 gold

title: Daydream
effect1: Draw 1

title: Honest work
effect1: Take 1 gold

title: Streetfight
effect1: Use the lowest rank plot other than this

title: Betray the conspiracy
effect1: Revive 1

title: Disguise as a peasant
effect1: If there is no lower rank plot, use the top plot in your discard

title: Ransom the Judge
effect1: If the highest rank plot is green, use the leftmost plot in the timeline

title: Mint coins
effect1: If you have 5 or less gold, take 5 gold
effect2: Take 1 gold for each plot rank 5 or less

title: Appoint a Sheriff
effect1: If you have 5 or more plots in hand, pay 1 gold

title: Revolutionize court fashion
effect1: If you have 20 or more gold, pay 1 from your discard

title: Vote in the College of Electresses
effect1: Pay 1 gold for each lower ranked plot

title: Give fealty
effect1: Pay the highest rank plot's time in gold

title: Declare bankruptcy
effect1: Take 1 gold for each plot in your deck

title: Buccaneer a treasure ship
effect1: Use the lowest rank yellow plot
effect2: Take 1 gold for each yellow plot

title: Impersonate a foreign countess
effect1: Flip your deck and put it on your discard

title: Escape through the secret passage
effect1: If there is a lower rank blue plot, use the lowest rank blue plot other than this

title: Rob the wretched
effect1: If there is not a tie for the lowest rank plot, use the lowest rank plot

title: Collect rents
effect1: Take 1 gold for each lower rank plot

title: Secretly author plays
effect1: If there is no blue plot, draw 2

title: Compose an ode to Her Majesty
effect1: Pay 1 from your deck

title: Expose the Marquise
effect1: Pay the lowest ranked plot's time in gold

title: Hold a market fair
effect1: If the leftmost and second leftmost plot in the timeline are different colors, draw 2
effect2: If the leftmost and rightmost plot in the timeline are different colors, revive 2

title: Steal from the rich and give to the poor
effect1: Take twice the highest ranked plot's time in gold

title: Challenge to a duel
effect1: Use the lowest rank blue plot twice
effect2: If it has a lower rank, take its rank in gold

title: Bribe the Judge
effect1: If there is a higher rank green plot, pay 3 gold

title: Torture the spymaster
effect1: Use the highest rank blue plot other than this
effect2: Revive as many as it has time

title: Start a riot
effect1: Use the lowest rank green plot
effect2: Take 1 gold for each yellow plot in the timeline

title: Charter an adventuring company
effect1: If there is no red plot, take 5 gold
effect2: If there is a purple plot, take 5 gold

title: Promise righteous governance
effect1: Pay 3 gold

title: Excommunicate the Cardinal
effect1: If 1 of the 2 leftmost plots in the timeline are purple, but not both, draw 6
effect2: Pay 1 gold for each purple plot in the timeline

title: Construct a cathedral
effect1: Pay 7 gold for each plot in your hand
effect2: If you have 7 or less plots in hand, revive 7

title: Inherit a title
effect1: Draw 3
effect2: Instead of paying or discarding, remove this from the game and return it to the box

title: Smuggle contraband
effect1: Put the top plot in your discard face down on top of your deck
effect2: If there is no red plot, take 20 gold

title: Storm the Palace
effect1: Use the highest rank green plot
effect2: If there is 1 and only 1 green plot, draw 4

title: Reclaim your rights
effect1: Take 4 gold

title: Find the mole
effect1: If there is another blue plot, revive 4
effect2: Otherwise, take 1 gold for each plot in the timeline

title: Declare martial law
effect1: Use the highest rank purple plot
effect2: Use the leftmost green plot in the timeline

title: Steal the diamond
effect1: If your deck or discard is empty, take 20 gold

title: Move the capital
effect1: Flip your discard and put it on your deck

title: Marry the Duke
effect1: Pay 8 gold
effect2: Use the leftmost plot in the timeline twice

title: Choose the next Pope
effect1: Pay 30 gold

title: Enclose peasant land
effect1: Pay 1 gold

title: Issue bonds
effect1: Take the highest ranked plot's rank in gold
effect2: If there is a red plot, pay 30 gold

title: Plunder the treasury
effect1: Use the highest rank yellow plot
effect2: Take 5 gold for each yellow plot

title: Become the Queen of Thieves
effect1: Revive 5
effect2: Take 5 gold for each blue plot

title: Found a secret order
effect1: Revive 4

title: Organize a mutiny
effect1: Use the highest rank plot other than this

title: Invest a Bishop
effect1: Take 30 gold for every other plot rank 30 or above

title: Fashion a crown
effect1: Pay 10 gold

title: Privelege
effect1: Take 10 times as much gold as you have
effect2: Use the highest rank plot other than this
